name: Minesweeper (UchiMama)
description:
Controls

  • Right click to place or remove a flag
  • Left click to reveal
  • R to retry 

----------

Written in C# with Unity.

Art: I used my Minesweeper tileset which you can download for free.

SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-retro-sfx-pack-43256#d...
